website_summaries.verdict: It's not the slimest wall mount on the market, but its ability to handle larger TVs makes it a viable option for budget-conscious consumers.
pros: Heavy duty solid metal construction supports TV's up to 120 pounds
cons: Setup and installation instructions are not very clear

website_summaries.verdict: It's not the slimmest wall mount on the market, but its ability to handle larger TVs makes it a viable option for budget-conscious consumers.
pros: Heavy-duty metal construction supports TVs up to 120 pounds
cons: Setup and installation instructions are not very clear

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty TV Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: The tv wall mount is easy to install and very durable. It also tilts forward or you can set it to standard. It is easy to install : just hang the wall mount up first and then attach the hanger to the back of the tv and it hangs on the wall mount and then screws on the bottom for a secure hold. It holds tv's ranging from 20" to 55".
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Study, everything included, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Used for 32" TV in bedroom. Tons of hardware options included and even included a bubble level and hdmi cable. I like the pull string lower rail lock release. It's low profile and it tilts to adjust viewing angle. Very sturdy and price is awesome. Not sure who buys TV wall mounts from your friendly neighborhood brick and mortars since they mark these things up so much often doubling or tripling the cost compared to Amazon! It's a piece of metal with holes and hardware, not sure why they charge so much. Can't go wrong buying from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DEEZ NUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Low price, easy to install (if you can find the studs) but potential safety issue
customer_reviews.text: I see that they make every effort to support many types of TV sets (they provided many different sizes of screws and nuts). Most of my installation time was spent to make sure I find the right stud behind the dry wall! After that, it's very easy to install the bracket on the wall and the 2 vertical bars on TV. I did everything by myself with a Sanyo 39 inch LED TV. But I think the mounting of the vertical bars (with TV attached) to the horizontal rectangular bracket is not very secure and the bottom "locking" mechanism is not tight at all. So it's potentially a safety issue if you have a person bumping into it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item yesterday at 1030am and 6 hours later my husband was installing it into our boys bedroom. He won't stop talking about how this mount is the best available at an amazing price and so easy to put together and very well constructed. This mount comes in a 9x9 box, pretty light weight. It was 15.99 and i paid 5.09 for same day delivery; SOOOO worth everydime... It is a steal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Singleton

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my wall that follows the 16" building code, it fit just right and it feels pretty solid. The bracket came preassembled all you need to do is mount it to the TV with the included hardware. My 37" LG hides it completely The only bad point I saw is that it doesn't completely lock in place as its designed, there are 2 hooks that you need to pull the strings on for them to release the tv from the bottom, mine don't have to be pulled so you can pull the TV away from the wall (which you normally do to plug stuff in) Already ordered 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Ferny

customer_reviews.title: We kept it, but wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.text: I kept it but wouldn't purchase it again. We used it to mount a 24" TV on a wall above our whirlpool. The bracket extended well above and below the TV, I had to use an angle grinder with a cut-off wheel and cut off the excess. Also, the bracket in the back covered the Ethernet connection/port on the TV, luckily we didn't have to use that port as the TV had wireless, but if we did need it it would have been a problem and we wouldn't have been able to use that port. So, for the challenges mentioned above I wouldn't purchase it again, but it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: The Thompsons

customer_reviews.title: "Really?", "Really?"
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers stated, this mount is literally for 16" studs...no greater. It comes in a jumble of 5 different pieces, that have to be bolted together, making me suspect of the claim that this is the most sturdy mount..ever. The only thing missing is the preamble to a great story, "This is true, no sh--". Do us all a favor and display at least one image of all the disassembled parts. That may influence the decision to buy this because of the low cost. Low quality that equals low cost is no bargain. As others have said, look elsewhere, or at least be more accurate in your reviews AND in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: ob1

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were good, installation wasn't too hard
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were good, installation wasn't too hard. However, it is hard to get behind the TV to add cables, adjust pitch, etc. I've been able to get to the back when needed, but always have someone nearby to make sure it's stable when doing it. I could have possibly used the included spacers to add a little more clearance but it's not worth the hassle at this point. This was my first wall mount installation and it wasn't as stressful as i thought it was. For a simple stationary mount, this one does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mount for approximately 2 years. The slim profile is what attracted me to it. I also like the fact that you can slide it to be centered in the area that you need it. It does tilt a bit but not much. It lets you lift it to access the inputs on the back of the tv but you are better off taking the tv down or plugging in the cords before putting it up. The access area is very small even if you have small hands. This makes it difficult to turn the cord in the direction needed. Overall I a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra few dollars for a one-piece frame braket
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast but I thought I was buying a one piece frame. After re-reading the product description it did indeed say it was two pieces so my bad. But notice the pictures don't show it in 2 pieces yet there's a picture of a patent warning!? It bolts together and is strong, but you must be careful on alignment otherwise it looks like a step and a level won't sit flush- throwing the TV out of level. Yes4All did offer a money back warranty, but I did not have the time to return and buy another one, so kudos to them. I'm not knocking the seller, just the product.
customer_reviews.author: Louis P.

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and Easy to install - think about your TV size
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and pretty to install item - I need a tilt only bracket that wasn't over priced. This fit my needs. I only gave 4 stars because while this technically worked for a 32" TV the vertical support bar's actually extended above the top of the TV. I was forced to use a side grinder to cut off the excess so the bar's didn't show. On a smaller TV it would have been even worse - likely showing above and below the screen. Guess that's the draw back of a kit that works from 20" to 55" TV's
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: ... have purchased from different companies and I would not recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the fifth tv mount we have purchased from different companies and I would not recommend this one. It came well packaged so we thought it would be as easy to assemble as the others but when we took it out of the package and checked it closer, we found that the 2 brackets for the back of the tv would not lock into place on the wall mount. My husband had to get out a grinder to file down the brackets to make it work. We would have returned it but it we were ready to mount the tv and didn't have other options at the time. Also, this mount just barely fit our 40".
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's free 42" flat screen that came with his purchase.... He was too lazy to ever get one and after a year of listening to him "talk" about getting one, I thought for the price I'd buy it.... Well worth it!! Holds flush to the wall and he was pleased...Solid bracket and beats paying out the rear for the pricey store bought ones especially when they both serve the same purpose
customer_reviews.author: alisabellos

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in regards to a wall mount. Very easy to install and put together. I was disappointment to know that the base of the mount (the part that is mounted to the wall) comes in two pieces which is not mentioned in the listing. All worked out however and the mount ended up being great for my needs. I originally was going to mount a 39" TV but it ended up not looking good on the wall and I mounted a 47" instead. The mount just barely fit for my 47" TV. There was no room left or right to move the TV on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Casey L

customer_reviews.title: Great product; highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It was easy to put together, it came with the mounting hardware, and the instructions were clear. It's been mounted in the living room, holding our 36" TV for weeks and we've had no problems. I love how this tilts; it makes it easier to view the screen when it hangs higher than your line of sight. I priced similar mounts and I would've paid triple for the same kit at the big chain stores. This is an incredible deal; I high recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't bad to put together, doesn't work as well on new Samsung flat screens
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to understand and assemble. Did have issues with getting it to "lock" once in the wake. It took 3 of us to get it completed and about 45 minutes or so. We have a 50 inch Samsung Smarttv and really had an ordeal trying to get the brackets to fit without blocking where it needed to be screwed in or interfering with the cables that hooked into the back. Overall, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value, decent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Much lower cost than the big box store options. Decent quality and plenty of extra hardware to cover many different mounting scenarios. The instructions were not super clear, but its not a very complex item, so it should be self explanatory after looking at the pictures. Be sure to mount the vertical pieces to the back of your TV first so you can determine the appropriate height to mount the backing plate on your wall. This way you'll get the TV where you want it without drilling extra holes in your wall!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Ok but the title is misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall-mounted to hang my 46 inch TV in my basement. When I bought it I noticed that the title said it would hang up to a 55 inch TV so I thought I was giving myself some leeway on the size. However when I open the box and found the packaging said it only mount up to a 47 inch TV. This is a fairly small amount compared to others that I have used, but when I hung it on the wall everything function well and there are no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Jen Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need included.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few concerns when this first arrived due to size of packaging.....but surprise surprise, everything was there and exactly what I needed. Can't remember exactly but I think I paid around $20 for this and I am very happy with what I got. Let's face it, TVs are getting skinnier and lighter, there's no need to spend $80 - $100 in the store for something that does the same job as this wall mount. Buy this if you are looking for low profile and tilt, and as long as you have a little mechanical savy you'll be in good shape. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Overall this mount is sturdy and will do the job indeed
customer_reviews.text: Overall this mount is sturdy and will do the job indeed! The only reason for the 4 star rating is because you have difficulty locking down the TV once you hook it into wall mounted portion of the bracket. Good quality steel and very simple to put together! I mounted a 50" Plasma by Panasonic and am pleased with mount holding it!I would recommend this device however I would recommend a long Phillips head screwdriver when locking down bottom of TV bracket to WALL bracket! Hope this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and secure
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and secure. I used different screws since it only lined up with one of my studs and the other needed drywall anchors. The strait vertical stays were long for the small 32" TV since it had a curved back. It still worked by offsetting the bars so they were not centered.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cheap. Don't expect alot.
customer_reviews.text: It works. The box came with everything you need and good instructions. Its cheap and functional but it is very limited - don't plan on moving it at all side to side as really not much room there. I'd consider spending an extra $10 and getting something with a bit more movement options. Also, if you have a newer Samsung 40" + model with the bump in the lower back of the TV you will need to use the spacers to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: this looks pretty cheap. After mounting two 2x4's on the wall ...
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of what i would get for $16, and when i opened the package i thought, this looks pretty cheap. After mounting two 2x4's on the wall for the mounting bracket to attach to, it fit perfectly and is very solid. I mounted my daughter's 32" tv on the wall in her room and it looks great and doesn't move at all. I will be buying 2 more of these mounts for the other 2 tv's in the house. Cant beat the price and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bbivens

customer_reviews.title: Love this mount!
customer_reviews.text: I have hung over a dozen flat panels for family and friends. This mount is all you need for most HDTVs. Unless you are hanging 55 or bigger get this mount. You have to bolt together the back plate that goes on the wall but so what, it took 3 minutes to do. I'm hanging a Samsung 32 in the basement tonight and am confident that this mount will be perfect for this job. Unless you're into wasting money you need to look no further. Just place your order and you will be very happy with it and the dollars you are saving!
customer_reviews.author: Rick from NJ

customer_reviews.title: If your walls have 16 or 18 inch stud spacing this will work fine. However
customer_reviews.text: First, the MFR recommends to mount the bracket into the wall studs rather than just the sheet rock. The wall bracket is two pieces, each about 12 inches long. If your walls have 16 or 18 inch stud spacing this will work fine. However, many newer homes have 24 inch stud spacing. I had to go to Home Depot and buy two heavy aluminum strips, drill holes in them to extend the effective width of this bracket. The MFR could have done us a favor by including steel strips for situations like this. But for the price, it's a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Frazee

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Dont waste money on high dollar mounts as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Dont waste money on high dollar mounts as this works perfectly! It is made for 16" spaced studs so keep that in mind as you will need to make an adapter board for 24" wood or metal studs but thats pretty simple (pic attached). Comes with all hardware needed to mount different brand tvs so all you need is some basic tools. Enjoy the extra saved cash!
customer_reviews.author: sal kille

customer_reviews.title: It works for my TV.
customer_reviews.text: The manual is little confusing and the website infoyes4all.com to get an updated manual was down. Just take your time when installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Evans

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product since we were moving and got rid of our entertainment stand. I wasn't to sure about it since we had just purchased a mobile home and the walls aren't as sturdy as a house.The product has held up nicely with no problems over the past four months. Personally it's a little hard to remove the TV once up but it works to my advantage since I have children who are prone to knocking things off the wall. Great product. Easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Vannessa W

customer_reviews.title: Hang that TV!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several different tv mounts and this is a nice setup, someone who is not mechanically inclined may have a small difficulty. Came with lots of spare nuts, bolts, washers and tools. The instructions are nominally helpful when it comes to the hook arms. There is a picture that helps those who are adept at picture instructions. Otherwise it seems to be a great unit. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: wanta know

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The bracket was not wide enough to reach the 'arms' that mount onto the back of my 42 inch Vizio so I had to separate the two pieces and remount them onto the wall individually to make it work. It did work and luckily for me, this is an old set for my workout room in the basement, not my living room. Otherwise, I most likely would've returned it for a more stout unit. In the end, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: James Robinson II

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mount Awesome Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Mounted yesterday and looks great on the wall. Easy install, holds tv with easy and got at a unbelievable price. Also great quality and strong, just because it’s less expensive doesn’t mean it’s less of a mount there’s no sacrifice in quality here.
customer_reviews.author: User 1

customer_reviews.title: ehh..
customer_reviews.text: very difficult to put together myself. So I let a man do it and it also took him a second, but it was a great price. i dont know if I will order again because it should not take all of that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making room
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have limited space in my room. The 32" TV was on my PC desk doubling as a monitor and TV. The TV couldn't keep up with my gaming so I got a monitor that could, this left no place to sit the TV so I got this wall mount for the TV. It was very easy to set up and install on the TV all the bolts and screws were with it.(Very uncommon) In 15 minutes the TV was on the wall! It's made of heavy steel and it rigid. I don't think I'll need to worry about it hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Goneanddidit

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional TV installer and I have to say this wall mount works perfectly as they say. A few things that I love about this mount is that it's affordable, durable and it comes with an hdmi cable. I would highly recommend everyone to stop purchasing those expensive brackets at the stores and purchase these because they do the exact same thing and you save a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This will work out just fine and is a good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This will work out just fine and is a good deal for the price. For a small TV like a 20 or 22 inch I would anticipate that the bracket would show as there is a bit of an overhang. I used this on a 49 Toshiba and looks really nice. Make sure you have a power drill, level, stud finder and socket wrench to make your life much easier when installing. I laugh when I see advertisements for professional mounting starting at $180. It cost me around $10 and an hour to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Don't depend on the misguided instruction manual.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the instruction manual needs some serious editing. First it says dry wall only, then you read further and it tells you to install the stone wall with specific size and depth. So which is it yes or no? Well I installed it on a stone block based wall with 1/2" wedge anchors 2 1/4 inch deep. Worked out very well for me. Really annoyed with the misinformation. Mount worked out at least.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Not Suitable for TVs Under 32", but Good for Larger TVs
customer_reviews.text: This mount is not suitable for TVs 32" or smaller, which is the only reason I give it 3 stars. The vertical bars mounted on the back of the TV are too long, and stick up above and below the TV when mounted. Obviously, you don't want to see that, and defeats the purpose almost entirely. This should not be advertised as a mount for TVs that are 32" or smaller. Luckily, I had a larger TV (46") that I needed to mount also, and it worked very well for that one.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Wall Mount
customer_reviews.text: Great tv holder. Easy for contractor to install. Tv stays put and no issue when we had a minor earthquake last year. Love having more space without a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer- LA Coffee Snob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Man the reviews are what drove me to getting these mounts. I purchased 2 for grandmother and her house is old. Didn't think her walls had the structure for it but it turns out that it did or at least these mounts were installed properly and we're perfect for her house. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DNU

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has been hanging on my wall for 5 months now, with no problems. The only very minor complaint is that for smaller TV's, the arms that run vertically are very long. I have a 42" and it seems to hardly cover the arms, so I could definitely see that if it were for anything smaller than 32" you would see them sticking out. Overall though, these are just as good as the ones you see in Best Buy or Wal-Mart for $100+; save your money, buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Winters

customer_reviews.title: Hang it where you want!
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, the product was excellent. I remember some people whining about having to center it to the studs and that might put it off center of the room. Well, I used my own logic. I used only one stud and drywall anchors for the other side. This bracket is going nowhere. I could hang 15 monkeys from this and it's not going to budge.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Hoit

customer_reviews.title: This bracket feels a bit cheap. Not sure I ...
customer_reviews.text: This bracket feels a bit cheap. Not sure I would have actually trusted it to hold a 47 inch TV. It wasn't usable for us because of the fact that its 16 inches wide MAX. Our stud spacing was indeed 16 inches but the TV would have been mounted way off center. Sold it instead of returning it because the return shipping was almost the cost of the original purchase, which alone is absurd.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bracket
customer_reviews.text: This is as good or better than many brackets at six times the price! (seriously) Very heavy duty. Once up, you can still adjust the TV position horizontally 8 inches and vertically 6 inches. If using a small TV (less than 33 inches) and the vertical brackets show, then just lop them off with a hacksaw. TV just lifts off by hand if you need to get into the back.
customer_reviews.author: Nino Deprophetis

customer_reviews.title: i had such high hopes being that it had great reviews.
customer_reviews.text: i had such high hopes being that it had great reviews.. BUT this product is Very flimsy for my comfort.. i have three tvs mounted in my home and NONE are this flimsy .. i also noticed some peoples photos in the reviews and the mounts look different from the one sent to me .. I'm returning it .. disappointed ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk... comes in 2 sections that must be leveled precise Again....NOT one wall bracket but 2 individual sections that make for more work. In the end it IS holding an old plasma set that must be 90Lbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one
customer_reviews.text: i looked around at some other models and wish I had have bought a different one... This product ultimately worked but the instructions or lack there of written in broken English and the random assortment of unnecessary parts included in the package made the installation quite challenging. If you enjoy puzzles that don't precisely align as they should - this product's for you.
customer_reviews.author: mattsmuh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Same quality as those costing many times more. Instructions were included, but were unnecessary. Simple install. The lag bolts included looked like they could hang a TV twice as heavy as the one I hung (48"). I had the bracket and TV mounted in 15 minutes. I'll be buying this one again for the other TV's in my home.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mastorakis

customer_reviews.title: From the windows to the walls
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our tv to put up in our room so that we could have more room. I needed something that was strong enough to hold a big TV. My husband put it together and was very easy. The only bad part I wish it had different bolts then the very thick ones. It was very hard to go in to the studs. We had another one for a different room and the bolts were surper easy to put through. Other than that I'm happy that it's up on our wall and I can have more room for me.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER NOLASCO

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: works very well this product is both well made and priced right. I comes with all the hardware you will need. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I would mount a large heavy TV with ti but for my purpose it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing this on a curve considering the price. I absolutely would buy it again for my purpose. It is designed down to a price and isn't made out of thick material but it is plenty for a light TV. I would mount a large heavy TV with ti but for my purpose it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great mount, but be aware of 400X400 mount limits.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy gauge mount. Can't beat the price! Less than $14. One thing to be aware of, if you have a 400X400 mount spacing, you will not have room to slide the TV either direction as the mount is just wide enough to allow this size. The picture shows a smaller TV mount pattern with the "arms" moved in. The whole bracket that mounts to the wall is around 17 inches wide so you may have a hard time hitting a stud on both sides of your desired mount area. I would guess that with two stud mounted lag screws and at least two to four expanding drywall butterfly bolts, this would still hold most TV's.
customer_reviews.author: the waterboy

customer_reviews.title: A little stressful, but great value.
customer_reviews.text: This bracket is a fantastic value. It is nice and strong and easy to use. My only complaint is that tightening the screws behind the TV, especially the ones that lock the TV in place on the bottom of the bracket, is a huge pain in the butt. I would still recommend this mount for anyone looking for a simple, cheap solution to mount a TV.
customer_reviews.author: FuegoFiddle

customer_reviews.title: improperly designed to accommodate the input cables on the backside of all TV's (can not easily adjust the spacing)
customer_reviews.text: This product is badly designed. Specifically, improperly designed to accommodate the input cables on the backside of all TV's (can not easily adjust the spacing). The mounting mechanism is also not easy to use and the poor materials uses add to the problem. In addition, the lack of angular adjustment makes for optimal viewing of the led/lcd screen. Bottom line, after finally mounting my Samsung TV with great difficulty and then trying to remove it from the mounting bracket, the release mechanism malfunctioned resulting in the TV dropping to the floor causing irrepairable damage. Bottom line, I found the mounting bracket to be poorly designed, and manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Michio Aoyagi

customer_reviews.title: Weird instructions. Plenty sturdy. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, instructions are only just clear enough to figure it out. There is one part of the instructions that starts out emphasizing the importance of something, but then the sentence just ends with the word 'of'' and then never continues with the instruction. Instructions also say you must mount in a wood stud, but they include the plastic mounting expanders. These kept just falling through the back of the wall so I would recommend getting some molly bolts around the same size as the mounting hardware. We had to do this. Plenty sturdy for my 42 plasma. I used spacers just for a little extra clearance. Plenty of wire clearance for me.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: As good as it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't need to get any better than this. For the money and the quality, no need to shop around any more. Mounted my 70" on the wall and sleep well at night knowing it will stay up there. Psss.... make sure you find a stud for large TVs or keep one eye open and hope you don't hear a crash in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jo Smo

customer_reviews.title: Great mount for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this mount. It arrived in a small box and it was in four pieces. After quickly putting the four pieces together, I mounted this on the wall and two months later it's still holding my new 46" TV in the bedroom. It's a GREAT mount. I've bought another one since for a smaller TV. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great mount for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well built wall mount. I looked everywhere to try to match pricing and couldn't. I was skeptical to buy it because of the price, but when I opened the box, I was pleasantly surprised to find a very sturdy bracket system. It does exactly what we need it to do. Hang a 40inch LED TV on a wall. It could easily handle a much heavier TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: only 4 stars because of the terrible drywall molly's
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to install and please PLEASE do yourself a favor and buy new drywall molly's ... the ones that come in this kit are useless horrible cheap and bad ... VERY bad .... like I now have three somewhere in my wall because they went through the hole because there is no lip to hold it in place bad ... other than that a great kit that comes with many different screws to fit your needs!
customer_reviews.author: Heavensheros

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the product, the base panel is ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the product, the base panel is a two pieces of design. It uses two screws to tight them together. Even connecting them together, it is still to shot to cover two joice space, I have to use extra wood chips to extend the coverage. It is not a heavy duty design.
customer_reviews.author: Desheng Yin

customer_reviews.title: Holds Samsung 40" LCD Wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quick ship, solid construction, easy install. All of the hardware was included. The instructions are a little confusing so you'll have to do some thinking and planning before you begin to guide through the assembly and install. Verify the drill bit used to install the wall lag bolt is the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: A wicked bargain
customer_reviews.text: In my wildest dreams, I couldn't have imagined such a stupendously capable tilt mount for my 55" 4k smart black Friday $448 tv. What sucks? Paying $100 for a mount at the store when you could own this swell gem for under $20. I can never go back to those mounts. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The description of this bracket indicates it can hold up to a 55 inch plasma TV. I received the bracket today and I have a very hard time believing this will hold my 50 inch 200 lb plasma TV. Fortunately I still had the old bracket that I had on the wall in my office. I had placed a 36 inch LED TV on it. I used this new bracket for that TV and the old one I used for the plasma again. I personally would not put more than a 46 inch LCD or LED TV on this bracket if that. This is just my opinion and the seller may feel otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John Skomal

customer_reviews.title: Best wall mount for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 5 star rating for the combination of quality and price, especially price. It is what it is, which is what every other wall mount is, cheap stamped metal. It does what it's supposed to do, it went together easily, just as it should. Now the price. $12.50 plus $6.00 bucks for shipping! How can you beat that? The cheapest fixed wall mount at Wally World is 69 bucks! If all you need is a basic mount, buy this, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: RickH

customer_reviews.title: works fine, It comes with fasteners
customer_reviews.text: works fine, It comes with fasteners, and the lag bolts are fine. It should have come with better hollow wall fasteners. the ones provided just "spun" when attempting to install, I had to go purchase some adequate wall fasteners in order to mount this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount TV wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: It was straight forward to mount to a wall in our bedroom. I bolted it to two wall studs for a 32" TV with the hardware provided in the package along with a level. It looks nice and frees up surface space and is easier to view. The wall mount is very strong and could easily support a much larger TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Working flat tv mount
customer_reviews.text: This worked out okay for my use on a 49" led tv. It only measures 16.5" wide, so you don't have any play if you want to center your mount at a specific location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 40" tv's
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 40" tv's. I bought two one for each of the bedrooms in my house. I have bought several brands of mounts from stores and paid 3 times the price for just a basic no tilt mount. Should of been shopping on Amazon all along! Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Its a little hard to follow the assembly instructions because it has photos of the steps that are in black and white and very grainy, unclear photos of how to assemble this. Overall this is a good sturdy mount but needs better instructions for assembly. Hard to see exactly where washers go on tilt bracket assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bracket, and adapts well to various sizes. I bought a 24" tv, and I had to adapt it myself because the brackets in the back are too tall if you follow their instructions. I was able to figure it out and I'm pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Lomas

customer_reviews.title: Good mount. The tilt feature is very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good mount. The tilt feature is very difficult to use unless you loosen the bolts a lot. Luckily I just needed it to remain flat against the wall, so that wasn't a big deal. This comes in a pretty small box too, so don't be surprised when you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Skyy Urtubia

customer_reviews.title: No Frills (maybe just 1) get it done wall mount Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Works just as designed I would say no frills gives you what you need BUT it does at a complete functional 15 degree tilt hinge which works perfectly. I have seen some negative reviews because you have to screw the wall plate and tv back bars together but that realty is not a problem at all. Probably only designed that way because it allows the manufacturer to package much smaller. Hung my 37 inch which is HEAVY at about 45lbs and holds it up very well. For this price margin it is a GREAT deal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product at first, but after reading g the reviews I decided to order it. I liked the price. The package came quickly and undamaged. It was super easy to install. We've had it about a month now and had to adjust it once! Im happy to have purchased this product! Well made and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bowie

customer_reviews.title: Bracket and mounts are nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bracket and mounts are nice and sturdy, but the wall anchors and bolts that are supplied suck. I the bolts were too small for the anchors, and I was able to pull them out by hand once screwed in all the way. Imagine a TV hanging from it. You buy this, be prepared to drive to Home Depot to get bolts and anchors that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great, plenty of tilt for 6' high tv mount
customer_reviews.text: Mounted our 40" Samsung TV to drywall, works great. More than enough tilt adjustment for hanging 6 feet above floor (center of TV is 6' above, that is)- had tilt to spare. Simple to assemble, solid parts, directions worked well enough for an average person, and came with TONS of spare screws/etc, for various situations.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe_89

customer_reviews.title: Slightly misaligned
customer_reviews.text: The back piece is actually two pieces that go together side by side. Unfortunately the holes aren't perfectly aligned so the end result is not quite level. We had to force the screws and mount it just slightly crooked so the TV looks level.
customer_reviews.author: zstar

customer_reviews.title: Very Good TV Mount.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, great price. Very easy to hang. It has been holding my 55" Samsung for about 8 months now and no issues so far. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I didn't buy similar from WalMart or Sams Club
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I didn't buy similar from WalMart or Sams Club. They were $70++ for one bracket in the stores but I bought TWO for less than $25. Easy to install, TV is very secure, 15% angle allows perfect pitch downward. Couldn't be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ran Sack

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and effective for a TV that isn't too heavy. The wall anchors aren't correctly sized for the provided bolts but can be made to be tight and secure with shims. Conversely, the package is supplied with a variety of mounting bolts for attachment to the TV. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morriss

customer_reviews.title: Works great, lots of hanging hardware options for just about any wall.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with an assortment of hanging hardware to meet all your needs. Very simply install. Not much to the tilt, it seems unsteady in the tilted position so we don't use it, but for a flush mount works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Wall Mount!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I opened the box and seen everything that came in it. All screws for most TV's. HDMI cable. Nylon zip ties and a very sturdy mount with a tilt adjustment. Easy to install. High quality for very little money. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: TV brackets are too long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the Vizio D32h-C0. Easy to install but the brackets can be seen either above or below the tv. Keep in mind this mount is Lao for a 20 in tv as well. This means that the brackets will definitely be seen that hold the tv.
customer_reviews.author: D. Best

customer_reviews.title: Heavy - Duty TV Wall Mount Bracket
customer_reviews.text: Bought The Wall Mount TV Bracket .Went Toughter Easly. Well Package Put It Toughter In One Day. Worked With My 37 Inch Flat Screen TV . For The Price $12.50 Even A Better Deal .Easy To Put Up It Everything The Dealer Said. Nice Hevey Duty Well Made.Nothing Bad About This Wall Mount .Thank U
customer_reviews.author: Robert Axley

customer_reviews.title: It does seem sturdy and i'll save it for another TV
customer_reviews.text: Please know that this mount is not wide at all - if your studs don't line up about perfectly you will not be able to center the TV where you want it. It does seem sturdy and i'll save it for another TV. It was missing one bolt, so I had to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Drdrool

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap! But no room for fondling.
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap wall mount. Easy to mount but not so easy to hide wires. Almost no room behind to stash wires or even get your hand behind to plug something in. It’s great for me that all I have is my roku stick plugged in and I don’t ever plug anything else in.
customer_reviews.author: brettpotts89

customer_reviews.title: it was great and my tv is hanging
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what it was supposed to do. Every part is there. It took a bit longer to setup than any other wall mount I've bought, but for less than $20 I didn't expect the world. All in all, it was great and my tv is hanging. It really is a universal mount.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because of how cheap the price was. This product works great though and I have had zero problems with it. Good buy! The only con is the back is two pieces and require a little extra time to align. The mounting hardware provided is only good for typical stud mounts and I had to mount into brick.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: This item came in somewhat bowed. I went ahead and made the adjustments myself. I just wanted to move on with my day of chores. There are these strap that are awkward to use for the supporting bars that hold the tv. It does its job but I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: The TV (Sylvania with a 200x200 pattern) went on very nicely. The quick release made it easy to do various routing of the cables to get it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Winsemius

customer_reviews.title: Good product at good price
customer_reviews.text: Good product at good price. Package includes lots of bolts/nuts (various sizes), washers, spacers and big drywall anchors and screws. I wish the package includes stud screws and snap toggle bolts, instead of the huge drywall anchors/screws that probably people won't use, but that was not a problem, since I could buy stud screws from local hardware store for 88 cents. I do love the bolts and spacers that are included in the package.
customer_reviews.author: OU1

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Got it out of the box and first impression, "Holy Mother of God" there is no way I am putting this together. metals pieces and a bucket of screws, but once I got started it was really quick and simple. works great
customer_reviews.author: EngineerEagan

customer_reviews.title: installed easily without the need for instructions
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, installed easily without the need for instructions, and has been sitting on my wall ever since without any issues (once adjusted to your preference there are no moving parts, which makes that an easy standard to meet).
customer_reviews.author: Israel O Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 40" Sony
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 40" Sony. All parts you would need are included and easy installation and great price point. TV slides laterally to get the perfect side-to-side position .Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: mike f

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: worked great. TV is mounted and solid. All hardware supplied worked great. It did not line up with my studs but I used some "butterfly" bolts that I had on one end. Would by again. And for the money? Its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: This was 11 dollars including shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick, it is made out of metal, is heavey, and mounted with no problem. You are provided with a large bag of hardware and different diameter and depth of mounting screws for the type of TV. Solid, one hell of a deal vs 100 bucks everywhere else and the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: bccol

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money but I fail to see how ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money but I fail to see how this properly fits smaller TV's. The arms stick out from the top of a 32 inch vizio. I cut them off and all it fine but it really should not be sold for smaller sets.
customer_reviews.author: WBoweIII

customer_reviews.title: TV mounting kit
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly easy. The kit included everything I needed to complete the installation. I installed this on a 39 inch LED TV which is mounted in my Motor Home. The bracket has a feature to lock the TV in position and prevent it from falling off the mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No need to pay top dollar for wall mount. This comes as a two piece unit that you have to assemble. Once on the wall it is as strong as any other. I mounted a 32" flat screen and it's still up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I purchased this on Amazon instead of at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to installing the mount and TV in my extra living room. I'm so glad I purchased this on Amazon instead of at a store because the saving was unbelievable while the quality was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: mark k

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for me but...
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install. This bracket is much lighter then the previous brackets I've installed so I could install it alone. Instructions were clear. Possible Con: if your mounting holes on your TV are the full 15.75" apart and your studs are the standard 16" on center, you have to center your TV between the studs. This bracket is just big enough to catch the studs. There is only 1/4" play left and right.
customer_reviews.author: ACUnit

customer_reviews.title: Great wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Great wall mount. A little to easy to take off in my opinion but 43" tv fits great! easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: davidshelpmeet

product_meta.title: Yes4All Tilt TV Wall Mount Bracket for 17 - 47” PLASMA, LCD, LED, OLED TVs – Fits 12” and 16” Stud Space – Bonus 10 ft HDMI Cable and 50 Zip Ties
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackExceptional quality with 60 day Free Return and 5 year Warranty
Arms, Wall Plate & TV Plate is made of 100% high grade steel, which is perfect to holds your TV securely.
53% thicker than competitors. Min 25% heavier. True rated capacity of 120 lbs.

Heavy-Duty Flat TV Wall Mount with Tilt & Easy 

Installation Innovative Design

The mount profile is 1 ¾ the flat position yet allows you to tilt up to +/-15 degree until you get the right angle and height for your comfort. Works great to enhance viewing and avoid neck, eyes strain.

This TV Wall Mount also comes with mounting hardware for extra convenience when you mount your TV; plus, the full instruction included for quick and easy to installment.

Cable management - Large opening in center of back-plate, provides space to pass your cables or install your power wires.

Will this fit your TV Wall Mount?

TV Wall Mount Tilt 20-47 VESA 400x400 Compatible

Type: Universally designed for flat screen Led, LCD, Plasma TV models with sizes range from 20 - 47".

VESA Patterns: This mount has standard VESA patterns of 50x50, 75x75, 100x100, 200x200, 200x100, 300x300, 300x200, 400x400, 400x300, 400x200 (mm). It's designed to support most TVs from 20" to 47" WITH MOUNTING HOLE PATTERNS up to 15.75" horizontally & 15.75" vertically (400x400 mm).

Max Weight Capacity: 120 lbs (55kg)
Full Package:
• TV Wall Mount
• All hardware, 10’ HDMI cable, bubble level included( 10' HDMI cable supports 3D, Ethernet, 1440P and Audio Return conforming to latest HDMI 1.4 Standard)
• 40 Zip ties
feature_bullets: FIT MOST 20 - 47-inch TVs: Universal design fits most 20 inch - 47 inch TVs up to VESA 400 x 400. Support 12" & 16" stud space

120-lb HEAVY DUTY: High standard heavy-gauge steel supports TVs up to 120 lbs or 55 kgs with powder-coated black finish offers a smooth surface and high tech look. Wall panels are cut from a solid metal sheets. Most heavy in the market for the same class. Weight 5 lbs (heaviest in class); 2.5 mm thick (53% thicker than competitor)

15° TILT & 1.5-inch LOW PROFILE: 15-degree tilt capability makes adjustments easy. Place your TV close to wall, 1.5" flush profile, saving space greatly with stylish appearance includes Easy to Reach Pull Tabs for the Safety Lock.

EASIEST INSTALLATION WITH FREE STUFF: Easiest installation with decent instruction , design template, one-piece wall plate design and all included hardware. Pulling straps lock and release TV breezily. Comes with 10-feet 3D HDMI, Bubble level, and 50 zip-ties for cable management.
5-YEAR WARRANTY: US based seller answers your pre-purchase and installation questions – 5-year warranty for your TV mount.
